fields.title: The Incredibly Strange Creatures Who Stopped Living and Became Mixed-Up Zombies!!?
fields.writer: Gene Pollock (screenplay), Robert Silliphant (screenplay), E.M. Kevke (original story)
fields.actors: Ray Dennis Steckler, Brett O'Hara, Atlas King, Sharon Walsh
fields.plot: Jerry falls in love with a stripper he meets at a carnival. Little does he know that she is the sister of a gypsy fortune teller whose predictions he had scoffed at earlier. The gypsy turns him into a zombie and he goes on a killing spree.

fields.title: Plan 9 from Outer Space
fields.actors: Gregory Walcott, Mona McKinnon, Duke Moore, Tom Keene
fields.plot: Evil aliens attack Earth and set their terrible "Plan 9" in action. As the aliens resurrect the dead of the Earth to destroy the living, our lives are in danger.

fields.title: Dünyayi Kurtaran Adam
fields.actors: Cüneyt Arkin, Aytekin Akkaya, Füsun Uçar, Hüseyin Peyda
fields.plot: Two space cadets crash-land on a desert planet, where an evil wizard seeks the ultimate power to take over the world. Although the movie borrows some background footage from Star Wars, the plot is mostly unrelated.

fields.title: Matango
fields.writer: Takeshi Kimura (screenplay), Shin'ichi Hoshi (adaptation), Masami Fukushima (adaptation), William Hope Hodgson (story "The Voice in the Night")
fields.actors: Akira Kubo, Kumi Mizuno, Hiroshi Koizumi, Kenji Sahara
fields.plot: Shipwrecked survivors slowly transform into mushrooms.
